trans-unit.source: The type of the channel to be created.
trans-unit.target: 要建立的通道類型。

trans-unit.source: Used to create a channel to a duplex service and associate that channel with a callback object.
trans-unit.target: 用於建立雙工服務通道並將該通道與回呼物件相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.DuplexClientBase%601> class to create a channel to a service that specifies a callback object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.DuplexClientBase%601> 類別來建立可指定回呼物件的服務通道。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.DuplexClientBase%601> object wraps a <xref:System.ServiceModel.DuplexChannelFactory%601?displayProperty=nameWithType> object, which provides the connectivity for the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.DuplexClientBase%601> 物件會包裝 <xref:System.ServiceModel.DuplexChannelFactory%601?displayProperty=nameWithType> 物件以提供與 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 物件的連接。

trans-unit.source: You can use either type to connect to a duplex service.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用任何一種型別來連接雙工服務。

trans-unit.source: For more information about duplex services, see [Duplex Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/duplex-services.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需雙工服務的詳細資訊，請參閱[雙工服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/duplex-services.md)。

trans-unit.source: Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class:
trans-unit.target: 給衍生自此類別之 Managed C++ 使用者的特別說明：

trans-unit.source: Put your cleanup code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor.
trans-unit.target: 請將您的清除程式碼置於 (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort)，而不是解構函式。

trans-unit.source: Avoid destructors: they cause the compiler to auto-generate <xref:System.IDisposable>
trans-unit.target: 避免使用解構函式：它們會導致編譯器自動產生 <xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Avoid non-reference members: they can cause the compiler to auto-generate <xref:System.IDisposable>
trans-unit.target: 避免使用非參考成員：它們會導致編譯器自動產生 <xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Avoid finalizers; but if you include one, you should suppress the build warning and call <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%28System.Object%29> and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) in order to emulate what would have been the auto-generated <xref:System.IDisposable> behavior.
trans-unit.target: 避免使用完成項；但是假如您加入一個完成項，就應該抑制建置警告並呼叫來自 (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) 的 <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%28System.Object%29> 和完成項，以模擬原本可能自動產生的 <xref:System.IDisposable> 行為。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use in the client of a duplex [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client type, the `SampleDuplexHelloClient`, to pass a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=nameWithType> object with the callback object to listen for callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明用戶端中雙工 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用戶端型別的用途 (亦即 `SampleDuplexHelloClient`)，以便將包含回呼物件的全新 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=nameWithType> 物件傳遞出去來接聽回呼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.DuplexClientBase`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.DuplexClientBase`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An object used to create the instance context that associates the callback object with the channel to the service.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立執行個體內容的物件，可將回呼物件與服務通道建立關聯。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.DuplexClientBase`1" /> class using the specified callback object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的回呼物件來初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.DuplexClientBase`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object using the `callbackInstance` object to handle all callback operations.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 會使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> 物件來建立新的 `callbackInstance` 物件，以便處理所有回呼作業。

trans-unit.source: The callback instance is null.
trans-unit.target: 回呼執行個體為 null。

trans-unit.target: 由使用者提供的 `callbackInstance` 用於服務所有回呼作業。
